name: common-react-toolkit
description: Toolkit of common React things to make developer's life a bit easier.

scripts.amend: git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push origin main -f
scripts.gh-publish: git push origin main && npm run ts-check && git branch -D publish && git checkout -b publish && git push origin publish -f && git checkout main
scripts.local-publish: npm ci && npm run build && npm publish

author: Yogesh Aggarwal
